title: Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as 

the Student Support Act 2011 

(Commencement of Certain Provisions) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited student support act 2011 (commencement certain provisions) order 2023

title: Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 2. The 12th day of Feburary 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 12th day of Feburary 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Student Support Act 2011 (No. 4 of 2011) shall 
come into operation: 

(a) 

subsection (3) of section 8; 

(b) 

subsection (5) of section 16. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

19 December, 2023. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 26th December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [695] 3

title: Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

The purpose of this commencement order is to bring into operation from the 
12th day of Feburary 2024, the remaining provisions of the Student Support 
Act 2011 (SI No. 4 of 2011), namely section 8(3) and section 16(5). 

Section 1 of the Student Support Act 2011 was commenced upon enactment. 
The Student Support Act 2011 (Commencement of Certain Provisions Order) 
2011 (S.I. No. 303 of 2011) commenced ss. 2-7, 8 (other than subsection (3) 
thereof), 9-11, 12 (other than subsection (1)(e) thereof, 14, 15, 16 (other than 
subsection (5) thereof), 17, 18, 19 (other than subsection (1)(c) thereof), 20, 21, 
23 
to 30 and Schedules 1 and 2. The Student Support Act 2011 
(Commencement of Certain Provisions) Order 2012 (S.I. 163 of 2012) 
commenced ss. 12(1)(e), 13, 19(1)(c) and 22. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [695]
